attributes.action: Lobby to scrap the Common Agricultural Policy and lobby worldwide for the end of agricultural subsidies in MEDCs, and the allwance of poorer countries to subsidise their own farmers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can poorer countries develop their more sophisticated secondary and tertiary industries, when they are crippled in agriculture by markets which are heavily favoured to us.

Some African countries can no longer even meet their own grain needs, whereas they could before because of the forcing of free markets upon them.

No matter how hard these countries try, they will always fail, the system is set up for their agricultural failure.

If we stopped subsidising our farmers, they would almost all surely disappear, but its the morally correct course of action to follow to end suffering.

This issue is akin with slavery, we are holding people in perpetual subservience, the only strong argument against it is that our economy will suffer and that was true of slavery also.

FOR OUR SLICE OF HEAVEN WE INFLICT HELL ON EARTH FOR OTHERS
